reviews.review_msg: Deggan is engaging and passionate about his content. This course was hard, but worth it. He is encouraging of his students, but also doesn't sugar coat shortcomings. He sees potential and wants to help it be fulfilled. Do not skip classes and head the feedback he gives, and it will be a rewarding class!

Easily my favorite class of the semester. Mark's lectures are engaging and funny, and cover a range of interdisciplinary topics. Lots of presentation work in this class, but the grading was well spread out.

hands down the best professor you will encounter at SFU. If you love literature and writing don't finish your degree without taking one of his classes. Caring, funny, interesting lectures, always encouraging and ready to help. Mark is one of the few profs that really helped me improve my writing. Really could not recommend more!
